# My frequently used color palettes

# Data for A, B, C
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
fav_colors_intro_3 <- data.frame(
  Sub = c("A", "B", "C"), Score = rep(1, 3))
```

# Plot 1
```{r}
fav_colors_intro_3 |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sub, y = Score, fill = Sub)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "summary", color = "black") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#F39B7FFF","#91D1C2FF","grey80"))
```

# The Big Bang Theory palette
```{r}
color_data <- data.frame(
  Color = c("Bazinga Red", "Bazinga Yellow", "Leonard Blue", "Penny Pink", "Apartment Brown"), 
  Hex = c("#E74C3C", "#F1C40F", "#3498DB", "#E91E63", "#8E6B47"))
ggplot(color_data, aes(x = Color, y = 1, fill = Hex)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.5) + 
  scale_fill_identity() + 
  geom_text(aes(label = Hex), vjust = 3, color = "black", size = 5) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank()) +
  labs(title = "The Big Bang Theory Color Palette")
```

# Friends palette

```{r}
friends_color_data <- data.frame( 
  Color = c("Monica's Purple Door", "Central Perk Green", "Couch Orange", "Taxi Yellow", "Rachel's Beige"), 
  Hex = c("#9171B5", "#4CAF50", "#F18F01", "#F7C143", "#D4B996") ) 
ggplot(friends_color_data, aes(x = Color, y = 1, fill = Hex)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.5) + 
  scale_fill_identity() + geom_text(aes(label = Hex), vjust = -0.5, color = "black", size = 5) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank(), panel.grid = element_blank()) +
  labs(title = "Friends Color Palette")

```
